anger	anger, anger, exasperation, rage
disgust	disgust, distaste, make someone feel abhorred, make someone feel queasy
fear	fear, phobia, uneasiness, fear
guilt	guilt, blameworthiness, self-reprimand, self-condemnation
joy	joy, cheerfulness, happiness, laughter
love	love, love, romance, loving
sadness	sadness, mourn, sadness, mournfulness
shame	shame, self-mortification, self-condemnation, self-indignation
surprise	surprise, astonishment, amazement, surprise
noemo	no emotion, unfeelingness, indifference, unenthusiastic
